# selectAll(_:)

**Instance Method**

Selects all text in the document.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBAction @MainActor func selectAll(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Handling Selections

- **currentSelection**: The current selection.
- **setCurrentSelection(_:animate:)**: Sets the current selection, in an animated way, if desired.
- **clearSelection()**: Clears the selection.
- **copy(_:)**: Copies the text in the selection, if any, to the Pasteboard.
- **scrollSelectionToVisible(_:)**: Scrolls the view until the selection is visible.
- **highlightedSelections**: Returns the array of selections that are highlighted using `setHighlightedSelections`.
